nodes.text: Why Matthew S do you find this article so fascinating? Why is there honor in marriage? What is it about marriage that makes it an honor?

Because I am one who likes see things from different angles. What better way to fight your enemies then to understand their viewpoint.  Before I am attacked on the the last statement, just because I understand a viewpoint does not meant that I accept it as true or that I don't reject it.

What do you see as your enemies view point? Is your only opinion that the view of your enemy says: gay marriage takes away the value of a regular marriage? If this is the thought we are debating why did you not answer the other two questions?
Yes there is honor in marriage but we are talking about a piece of paper that defines who is considered your family in the eyes of the law.
